data.name: codeplex
data.value: ONS/NS Convert Tool(CHS and English) http://uve.codeplex.com

data.name: detailedInfo
data.value: If you have any problems, Please click "About" .

data.name: Intro
data.value: UVEngine contains a ONS-Compatible Layer, with which you can use most of the ONScripter features. Please visit the following sites to get specific information.

data.name: agecomfirm
data.value: Before using this service, please confirm that your age is more than 13.

data.name: askbenchmark
data.value: It seems to be your first time to run the application. Do you want to have a performance test for your phone?

data.name: firstUse
data.value: This application is developed by W-Otaku DEV. Please read our terms of use in the "About" page before using the application.

data.name: networkerror
data.value: There is an error with the Internet connection. OpenXLive is an online feature. You must connect to the Internet to use it.

data.name: perftestexittip
data.value: The device is being tested, do you like to exit ? It may have some files remained if you exit now.

data.name: comfirmdelete
data.value: Do you really want to delete the game?

data.name: deleting
data.value: The game is being removed. It may be not completedly removed if you exit now. Do you still want to exit?

data.name: reservesave
data.value: Do you want to reserve the save files?

data.name: tileerror
data.value: You seem to have already pinned the game to start. Here comes the error message:

data.name: benchremain
data.value: The remain file of your last benchmark

data.name: fc_text_1
data.value: Sorry, We met some problems and UVE has to be closed. Error Description :

data.name: fc_text_2
data.value: If you want to help us solve this bug ,please capture this screen and contact us in the following way: Email: w-otaku-dev@live.com

data.name: listerror
data.value: An error occured while loading the list :

data.name: notfrommarket
data.value: The copy of the application you installed is NOT purchased and installed from Windows Phone Store. We need your support to make the software better. Do you want to go to Windows Phone Store to see this application?

data.name: sdinserted
data.value: External Storage has been inserted. Would you like to enable External Storage?(Notice : Current version does NOT support games in SD card )

data.name: sharedusage
data.value: To store tiles' pictures or etc.

data.name: trailversion
data.value: Do you want to have a free trail first?

data.name: aboutfileclear
data.value: This feature is only provided for removing some files which you don't need any more, such as "temp.zip". Removing other files may cause your data damage.

data.name: confirmdelete
data.value: Are you sure to remove this folder/file?

data.name: imp_t_1
data.value: Please set up a new folder in your phone's Pictures folder called "UVE" and copy all the png file you want to import to the

data.name: imp_t_2
data.value: of it. Those pictures will appear here and you can import them in one click.

data.name: imp_t_3
data.value: Sometimes you may have to restart the phone to see them appear here. Free space :

data.name: nopicfound
data.value: No pictures found in UVE album

data.name: removing
data.value: Removing files now. Will continue removing after you leave this page.

data.name: clearconfirm
data.value: Are you sure to remove all files?

data.name: clearwarning
data.value:
This operation will remove the following items permanly : 1.All of the UVE games imported to phone. 2.All of the save data of UVE games. 3.The settings of this app. 4.OpenXLive login session. 5.Your background image. 6.All the cache of this app.
It will not remove : 1.Games in SD card. 2.Skydrive backups. 3.OpenXLive online personal information. 4.This app itself.
Are you sure to remove all?

data.name: extenabled
data.value: External Storage has been enabled. Please connect your phone to PC and set up a folder named "ADV" in the SD card root and put the game folders into this directory. Then please check this checkbox. NOTICE: because of the API limit of WP8, you must use the fully packaged scripts and games. Currently this feature is not enabled to public and these settings are only for feature preview.

data.name: hidedebug_description
data.value: Uncheck this and you will see all performance information on the screen including fps count, RAM usage and etc.

data.name: maximumram
data.value: Maximum RAM that this app used :

data.name: nosd
data.value: Your phone does not support SD card or you haven't inserted one.

data.name: readfromsd
data.value: Read game data from sd card

data.name: sdnotenabled
data.value: External Storage is not enabled. Please connect your phone to PC and set up a folder named "ADV" in the SD card root and put the game folders into this directory. Then please check this checkbox. NOTICE: because of the API limit of WP8, you must use the fully packaged scripts and games. Currently this feature is not enabled to public and these settings are only for feature preview.

data.name: willremove
data.value: Application will remove all the data and then exit automatically. it may take some time.

data.name: willrestart
data.value: UVE will close to apply these changes. Please restart UVE to complete the process.

data.name: notenoughspacefortest
data.value: Your disk space is not enough for testing disk performance. Will skip this step.

data.name: extVideo
data.value: Use system player to play video

data.name: passwdmes
data.value: Please enter your password. If you type the wrong password, the application will close.

data.name: quicksharedesc
data.value: Enable this feature and you will be able to share what you are playing with a automatically done screen capture by full pressing the camera button in the application. Remember NOT to share anything illegal or unsuitable to the SNS service you use.

data.name: setpasswdreq
data.value: require a password to use the app

data.name: aboutInfo
exitconfirm_1
data.value: Press back button for two times

data.name: exitconfirm_choose
data.value: Please select a way for exit confirm :

data.name: openxliveproblem
data.value: OpenXLive service is not running. Do you have an internet connection ?

data.name: clouddesc
data.value: Please sign in and authorize the app to access your SkyDrive first. "Backup" operation will pack up all the existed saves first and upload them to your SkyDrive and wipe all the backup data in the cloud. "Recover" operation will download your cloud backup from SkyDrive and recover them. Files will be overwritten if existed in the local storage.

data.name: exitwitherror
data.value: Script engine exited with error code :

data.name: donatedesc
data.value:
We've spent a lot of money on the following test devices and services:
Microsoft App Hub
Lumia 920
Lumia 820
Lumia 520
HTC 8s
Samsung ATIV S
But we still published a full free version because we wish everyone who uses WP8 can enjoy this software for free as Android or iOs users do. We would be really happy if you are willing to donate to us so that we can do better and keep updating the software for free. Use the "Donate" button to get more specific information, or continue if you don't want to donate now.

data.name: thanks
data.value: Thank you for your support. We will receive it soon.

data.name: donatemethoddesc
data.value: There are two ways to donate to us

data.name: inapppurchase
data.value: Use in app purchase($0.99 every time)
